domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Frontline
entity.description: "Frontline" offers an unflinching and compelling look at complex, vital and often-controversial subjects. Each broadcast consists of a long-form news documentary. Topics run the gamut -- from Bernie Madoff's intricate fraud and prisoner abuse at Abu Ghraib, to AIDs, racial issues and Wal-Mart's effect on the U.S. economy.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes I watched the Frontline episode tonight on PBS about the Coronavirus here in the US. According to medical experts in the actual trenches and many state governors, you have FAILED miserably. And, the experts predict that with your push to open America by May 1st, we’ll be right
